text: Historicization refers to the process of turning an object from a current event to a historical event. Historicization is said to be a basic element of the aesthetics founded by German playwright Bertolt Brecht (1898 – 1956). * Brecht, Bertolt. 1964. Brecht on Theatre: The Development of an Aesthetic.
